title: SCP-2000 vs. SCP-844
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Can a new recruit survive against a predatory mass of dust and bones? Find out in the first episode of my animated series, featuring [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-844 SCP-844] and my take on [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-2000 SCP-2000].

[[embedvideo]] 
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hDy0Gw1l_G0" title="Send in the Clones | SCP-844 | Rookies - Episode 1" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

Many thanks to [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-vikki-lost Dr Vikki Lost] for showing me how to embed the video.
author: fifty3dragons
